item.title: Getting a skeleton up and running
item.description: I was going to make my firt post “what is a path tracer anyway?”, but part of the point of this project is to learn exactly that by doing. So instead, let’s start somewhere a bit more practical. Getting a skeleton up and running To develop this project, I’m personally using vscode’s in-docker development features. This essentially means spinning up a custom docker image for all development so that anything installed is nicely isolated from your host system.
